Public Member Functions

 AudioPlayer ()
virtual ~AudioPlayer ()

Detailed Description

The responsibility of an AudioPlayer is to play sounds (represented by AudioReferences/AudioActiveReferences) at the request of the AudioPriorityManager (PM), and to notify the PM of changes in playback state.
